channel.title: Tobacco on Martin's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Tobacco on Martin's Blog

item.title: No smoking, please
item.description: I see that Slovenia is quite behind the smoking ban that is in the process of being inforced across the EU. I arrived in Wales on the 7th of April and that was the weekend, when the ban started here. There was no big deal, however we will see what will happen in a few months time when the temperature drops. The ban was enforced just before the summer and it was followed by a very warm period.
